title: Panel
para: The panel can now be themed along with the rest of the desktop, including icon theming.
Here are a few of the more significant GNOME panel improvements:

sect2.title: Show Desktop
sect2.para: When the icons on your desktop are hidden by too many open windows, you can now quickly hide them and then bring them all back again by clicking the "Show Desktop" button in the panel.

sect2.title: Search For Files
sect2.para: As before, you can now quickly find files via the Actions menu. Now it has an improved user interface and better integration with the file manager, so you can drag and drop files from the results window. And, like the file manager, it can open files with the appropriate applications.

sect2.title: Open Recent
sect2.para: The Actions menu now lists the last few files that you have opened. Just select the file to open it with the appropriate application.

sect2.title: Notification Area
sect2.para: The panel now has a notification-area which applications such as instant messengers can use to inform you of significant events.

sect2.title: Wireless Link Monitor
sect2.para: A new Wireless Link Monitor applet has been added. This shows the strength of your wireless network connection.
